message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed day: breadth slightly negative with many midcaps closing red while a handful of momentum names (APOLLOHOSP, OFSS, CHOLAFIN, POLYCAB, MUTHOOTFIN) and smallcap PSU/metal plays (HUDCO, HINDCOPPER) showed strength. Energy/chemicals (DABUR, LAURUSLABS, TATACHEM) and logistics (AEGISLOG) weakened. Very heavy absolute volumes in IDEA/SUZLON; price action there was soft.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "HUDCO", "signal": "Buy watchlist (breakout setup)", "reason": "Strong bullish candle; close almost at day’s high, momentum continuation likely if today’s high is reclaimed.", "price": 239.96},
    {"symbol": "MANAPPURAM", "signal": "Buy watchlist", "reason": "Wide-range green candle with close near high; potential follow-through if high is taken out.", "price": 293.90},
    {"symbol": "APOLLOHOSP", "signal": "Buy watchlist (momentum)", "reason": "Large bullish candle, strong close; looks set for continuation on strength above today’s high.", "price": 7739.00},
    {"symbol": "OFSS", "signal": "Buy watchlist (strength)", "reason": "Strong up-close, near day’s high; potential swing continuation.", "price": 9056.50},
    {"symbol": "CHOLAFIN", "signal": "Buy watchlist", "reason": "Wide-range up day with close near high; watch for breakout continuation.", "price": 1630.00},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Buy watchlist (metal momentum)", "reason": "Strong green day and improving momentum; watch for higher-high confirmation.", "price": 296.57},
    {"symbol": "GODIGIT", "signal": "Buy watchlist", "reason": "Open = low and strong close near high; intraday strength suggests buyers in control.", "price": 356.95},
    {"symbol": "SUNDARMFIN", "signal": "Buy watchlist", "reason": "Solid bullish close and reclaim of intraday weakness; potential continuation if highs are cleared.", "price": 4664.80},
    {"symbol": "AEGISLOG", "signal": "Risk: Weakness", "reason": "Bearish wide-range down day, close near low; monitor for potential removal if weakness persists.", "price": 772.50},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Risk: Weakness", "reason": "Large bearish candle closing well below open; avoid buying until strength returns.", "price": 903.80}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 25000,
    "total_value": 25000,
    "holdings_count": 0,
    "holdings": []
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Process: No mid-week trades. Build a buy list from strong closers; place Monday orders only if they trade above today’s high with acceptable risk.",
    "Position sizing (given 25k capital): prefer 3–5 positions of ~4–6k each; avoid illiquid/high-ticket names (e.g., PAGEIND, DIXON) for now.",
    "Watch SUZLON: soft close near 60; momentum resumes only on sustained move back above 61.",
    "PSU/Infra: HUDCO showed a near high close; RVNL/IRCON softer—prefer relative strength (HUDCO) over laggards.",
    "Healthcare divergence: APOLLOHOSP strong; LAURUSLABS and METROPOLIS weak—stick to strength.",
    "Financials: CHOLAFIN, SUNDARMFIN constructive; INDUSINDBK/AUBANK weak—avoid until reversal.",
    "Metals: HINDCOPPER strong; track follow-through before entry; SAIL modestly positive.",
    "Possible removal candidates if 2 more weak sessions: AEGISLOG, DABUR, LAURUSLABS (pending confirmation of continued underperformance).",
    "Trigger plan (Monday-only): buy-through of today’s highs for HUDCO, MANAPPURAM, APOLLOHOSP, OFSS, CHOLAFIN, GODIGIT; skip if gap-up exceeds 2% without retest."
  ]
}
